# Confess (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Language-Dependent Spells|language-dependent]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 212

You ask the target creature a single question. On the subjectâ€™s next action, it must answer truthfully in the same language as the question or take 1d6 points of damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d6) and be [[Sickened|sickened]] for 2d4 rounds. A successful Will save negates the sickening effect and halves the damage. A creature that is unable to answer still takes damage.
